name: Kevin Tomsovic
content: Home page for K.L. Tomsovic Kevin Tomsovic On leave to Clemson University - Charleston Innovation Campus CTI and Chancellor's Professor 512 Min H. Kao Building 1520 Milddle Drive Dept. of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science The University of Tennessee Knoxville , TN 37996-2100 Tel: 865 974-2693 FAX: 865 974-5483 email: tomsovic at utk.edu Electric power and energy at University of Tennessee CURENT is an Engineering Research Center which has been investigating wide area control methods for the power grid to enable the integration of high levels of renewables. It was supported by NSF/DOE from 2011 to 2021. The Center has expanded its areas of research since graduating from NSF/DOE support. It continues as an active research center under the direction of Dr. Fangxing (Fran) Li. My Background Curriculum Vitae - out of date See Google Scholar page for up to date publications Current Course offerings - none at UTK Personal Some Favorite Quotes "....Â  madness suddenly ceases to be a refuge and becomes incarnate in the shattering sky and all his surroundings in the presence of which reason, already struck dumb, can only bow the head." Malcolm Lowry, Under the Volcano. "As a general rule, people, even the wicked, are much more naive and simple-hearted than we supposed. And we ourselves are, too." Fyodor Dostoyevsky, The Brothers Karamazov. "The gods to each ascribe a differing lot: Some enter at the portal. Some do not!" Ford Madox Ford, Parade's End.
